backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no logic implemented.
feature_evidence.json: Report listing feature implementations, involved files, components, and test IDs for system verification.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of all frontend source files and their roles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining theme variables and component styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML entry point loading fonts, icons, and mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication, sidebar navigation, and conditional rendering of inventory and billing views.
frontend/src/components/auth/PasswordLog: Password-only login screen with input handling, validation errors, and loading state.
Billing interface with product search, cart management, and bill finalization features.
frontend/src/components/erp/InventoryVie: Inventory management UI for adding items, updating stock, searching, and deleting entries.
frontend/src/components/erp/MainHeader.t: Header displaying current view title, sales metrics, and an optional logout button.
frontend/src/components/erp/SalesHistory: Displays a sales table with time, summary, total, and a delete button for each sale.
frontend/src/components/erp/Sidebar.tsx: Renders the ERP sidebar with profile image upload, live clock, navigation, and asset value display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, status tracking, and persisted identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useInventory.ts: Manages inventory items with loading, saving, search filtering, stock updates, and asset value calculation.
frontend/src/hooks/useLiveClock.ts: Provides live-updating time and date values via an interval.
frontend/src/hooks/usePasswordGate.ts: Implements a simple password gate using sessionStorage with login/logout and session checking.
frontend/src/hooks/useSales.ts: Handles loading, saving, adding, deleting, and summarizing sales records with computed totals.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global UI theme and styles, including layout, login screen, sidebar, tables, and components.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Utility functions returning formatted current date and time strings.
frontend/src/lib/enterKeyShift.ts: Handles Enter key to move focus or trigger submission for sequential input navigation.
Validates localStorage key contracts during development to prevent breaking persisted data.
frontend/src/lib/inventoryStorage.ts: Loads and saves inventory data from localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/localStorageKeys.ts: Defines constant localStorage keys for inventory, sales, and profile image.
frontend/src/lib/profileImage.ts: Loads and saves the profile image URL to localStorage with a default fallback.
frontend/src/lib/salesStorage.ts: Loads and saves sales data from localStorage.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/types/erp.ts: Defines TypeScript types for views, inventory items, cart items, and sale records.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
